subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Two riders in the Tour de France sustained minor injuries Friday in the 13th stage when they were struck by shots from what was most likely a BB gun, Tour officials said.
snippet: Two riders in the Tour de France sustained minor injuries Friday in the 13th stage when they were struck by shots from what was most likely a BB gun, Tour officials said.
